article_title: Democrats, Republicans clash over cigarette tax in Oklahoma
article_text:
Ada, OK (74820)

Today

Mixed clouds and sun with scattered thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. High 76F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Isolated thunderstorms during the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight. A few storms may be severe. Low near 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

article_metadata.author: SEAN MURPHY Associated Press

og.description: OKLAHOMA CITY — The Oklahoma House rejected a proposed $1.50-per-pack tax on cigarettes to help stave off cuts to the state’s health care system, with Democrats uniting against the plan
